get_sticker_id_string: The id of this sticker is: {stickerid}
cant_create_sticker_pack_string: Oops, looks like I don't have enough permissions to create sticker pack for you! You need to start this bot first.
kang_description: Steal people's sticker/create new sticker and add it to your sticker pack.
getsticker_description: Reply to a sticker to get the sticker info.
stickerid_description: Reply to a sticker to get the sticker id.
give_sticker_to_kang: Reply to sticker you want to kang.
